text: If you got the money honey I got the time and when you run out of money honey I run out of time.
author: Willie Nelson

text: When you hire that first person, then you're a boss. You've got performance reviews. You've got complaints about not making enough money. You've got people who are just going to sell your story to the tabloids.
author: Scott Adams

text: The only security men can have for their political liberty, consists in keeping their money in their own pockets.
author: Lysander Spooner

text: It can be liberating to get fired because you realize the world doesn't end. There's other ways to make money, better jobs.
author: Ron Livingston

text: Money couldn't buy friends, but you got a better class of enemy.
author: Spike Milligan
